description: Enterprise techniques used by CloudDuke, ATT&CK software S0054 v1.0
name: CloudDuke (S0054)

techniques.comment: CloudDuke downloads and executes additional malware from either a Web address or a Microsoft OneDrive account.
One variant of CloudDuke uses HTTP and HTTPS for C2.
One variant of CloudDuke uses a Microsoft OneDrive account to exchange commands and stolen data with its operators.
